revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "Year 23 of Marcus Aurrelius Commodus Antoninus Augustus, Epeiph 6, to the account of Pauni. Have paid for poll tax of the 23rd yr. at Moiris (?): Ptolemaios, son of Papos and Herais, grandson of Onesimos, twenty dr., equal 20, with an extra charge of ten copper obols; and Melanas, his son, whose mother is Sambous, likewise twenty dr., equal 20 dr., with an extra charge of ten copper obols.;And the 24th yr., Epeiph. . ., to the account of Pauni. Have paid for poll tax of the 24th yr. at Moiris (?): Ptolemaios, son of Papos, twenty dr., equal 20 dr., with an extra charge of ten copper obols; and Melanas, his son, whose mother is Sambous, twenty dr., equal 20 dr., with an extra charge of ten copper obols."
